# Howard Knight (politician)

| birth_place         = Royal Oak, Michigan
| death_date          =

Howard Allen Knight (December 22, 1926 â€“ November 6, 2002) was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives.
Background
Knight worked in Insurance and his office was based in Fremont, Ohio. He was a state representative from 1963 to 1972.
